notesShort: Toad and turnip are effective at edgeguarding Shulk, so be precise with your recoveries.
She cannot deal with you being below her, so focus on juggling.
Use D-Tilt and aerials to wall her, as you drastically outrange her.
You're already in a worse position against this character if you're shielding against them due to their absurd pressure and float mixups that can't be reacted to.
Take note of them holding turnip in shield, as that's their main way to contest the range that Shulk has with turnip OoS.
